Play peexi

peexi punk

An online MMO game based on the F2T (free to play) model, set in a cyberpunk style. It operates within a large platform ecosystem.

Play closed beta test

About the project

Explore the Future World

Join us

Blockchain and Technologies

Our world is filled with neon lights of megacities, giant corporations and endless opportunities for exploration and adventure. In Peexi Punk you will:

Explore detailed locations, from dark alleys to high-tech laboratories.

Meet and interact with many unique NPCs, each with their own goals and stories.

Get involved in dynamic events and missions that develop the main storyline.

The storyline unfolds in the future, in the star system of Kronaris. Here, among numerous planets, one of the human colonies and other intelligent races are searching for the new worlds to colonize. These explorers are called Progress Seekers. The game's plot develops on two planets, where the bravery and resourcefulness of the Seekers will determine the future of the

entire system. Join this incredible adventure and become part of the epic saga of interstellar exploration.

Planet

Astrania

The first planet, where all adventurers land, serves as a neutral zone and the starting point for the adventure. The planet is equipped with high-tech hubs, including shopping centers and research laboratories. You can purchase apartments that allow you
to mine the local currency â€“ astrocredits.

Planet

Kronoskar

The planet where Seekers go for the main storyline consists of seven combat zones, each with its unique style and features. Each location is inhabited by unique monsters and contains dungeons with mysterious artifacts and rare resources necessary for progressing through the storyline and upgrading equipment.

Unique classes

The game features five unique classes, each tied to a specific race. Each class has its distinct playstyle and is suited for various tasks: from dealing damage to enemies to tanking attacks and engaging in positional battles.

Battle Mage

01

Uses ancient crystals for pyromancy and other forms of magic.
